content:
𝗕𝗟𝗨𝗥𝗥 | Autonomous on-device AI agent for Android that understands natural language commands and operates the phone's UI to achieve them.  📈 Growing!

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🤖 Kotlin 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Autonomous on-device AI agent for Android that understands natural language commands and operates the phone's UI to achieve them.
📅 Created: Jun 2025 • Updated: Aug 2025

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Intelligent UI Automation
✅ High Quality Voice
✅ Persistent & Personalized local Memory


❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐ 88 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 13 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 23 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Panda is an on-device AI agent for Android that automates phone tasks through natural language commands. It utilizes intelligent UI automation, high-quality voice, and persistent local memory to provide a personalized assistant experience. The agent interacts with the Android Accessibility Service to control the device and leverages LLMs for reasoning and planning.

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/Ayush0Chaudhary/blurr

𝗧𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗗𝗢 | Managing todo lists in a terminal-based user interface without requiring an account or database.  

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐹 Go 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Managing todo lists in a terminal-based user interface without requiring an account or database.
📅 Created: Aug 2025 • Updated: Aug 2025

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Keyboard based TUI
✅ Markdown file storage (.tododo.md)
✅ Create/Toggle Complete/Edit/Delete tasks
✅ Hide completed tasks


━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐ 11 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 0 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 0 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Tododo is a terminal-based todo manager that utilizes markdown files for data storage. It provides a keyboard-driven interface for creating, editing, completing, and deleting tasks, as well as hiding completed tasks. The primary goal is to offer a simple and account-free todo management solution.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/bmarse/tododo

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

𝗪𝟯𝗔𝗙 | Identifying and exploiting vulnerabilities in web applications.  ✨ Notable!

♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Identifying and exploiting vulnerabilities in web applications.
📅 Created: Aug 2011 • Updated: Aug 2025

♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Web application vulnerability scanning
✅ Identifies 200+ vulnerabilities
✅ Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) detection
✅ SQL injection detection
✅ OS commanding detection


♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 4.8K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 1.2K 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 2K 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

The w3af repository provides a web application attack and audit framework, functioning as an open-source web vulnerability scanner. It helps developers and penetration testers identify and exploit vulnerabilities such as Cross-Site Scripting, SQL injection, and OS commanding in their web applications, with the capability to detect over 200 different types of vulnerabilities.

♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/andresriancho/w3af

𝗚𝗛𝗢𝗦𝗧 | Remotely accessing and controlling Android devices for post-exploitation activities using the Android Debug Bridge.  ✨ Notable!

•••••••••••••••••••••••

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Remotely accessing and controlling Android devices for post-exploitation activities using the Android Debug Bridge.
📅 Created: Dec 2019 • Updated: Aug 2025

•••••••••••••••••••••••

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Android post-exploitation
✅ Remote access via Android Debug Bridge (ADB)
✅ Exploitation framework


•••••••••••••••••••••••

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 3.1K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 1K 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 2 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

•••••••••••••••••••••••

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Ghost Framework is an Android post-exploitation framework that leverages the Android Debug Bridge (ADB) to enable remote access and control of Android devices. It provides a platform for executing post-exploitation tasks on compromised or targeted Android systems. The framework facilitates various hacking and penetration testing activities.

•••••••••••••••••••••••

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/EntySec/Ghost

𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗞𝗔𝗣 | Hunting down malicious Telegram bots by identifying leaked bot tokens and chat IDs.  📈 Growing!

✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Hunting down malicious Telegram bots by identifying leaked bot tokens and chat IDs.
📅 Created: Feb 2025 • Updated: Aug 2025

✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ FOFA & URLScan Integration for Bot Token/Chat ID Hunting
✅ Export Logs of Hunt Results


✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐ 712 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 130 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 1 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Matkap is a Python-based tool designed to hunt down malicious Telegram bots. It achieves this by integrating with FOFA and URLScan to search for leaked bot tokens and chat IDs. The tool also provides functionality to export hunt logs for further analysis.

✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱

• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/0x6rss/matkap
